thread.section_title: Planet of the Vapes Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of Planet of the Vapes | planetofthevapes.com | 3 of 84
thread.title: Bruce
thread.title_full: Planet of the Vapes reviewed by Bruce

author: Bruce
title: Bruce
text:
I have purchased two portable vaporizers from this site. The experience has been excellent, and the shipping has been much faster than expected.
There is a manufacturering flaw on the most recent vaporizer I purchased, and POTV has offered to replace the piece free of charge. Would recommend.
